categories.title: Recent Updates and Fixes in ElizaOS

content.text: A bug fix was implemented to allow re-initialization of agents through the client direct API on the `/agents/:agentId/set` route. This change is crucial for continuing the use of the client-direct API to restart agents.

A fix was made to the package installation process using the pnpm node-linker setting, allowing packages to be installed using symlinks. This resolves issues with dynamically loading plugins from the new registry.
The Discord actions were fixed, except for the download media plugin due to issues with `ytdl`. This plugin has been temporarily commented out.

A refactor of the agent/character system was conducted, introducing a new endpoint for starting agents by character name and enhancing CLI commands. This refactor also improved type safety and error handling.
Support for Secret AI LLM was added, allowing Eliza-based agents to use Secret’s Confidential AI for data protection. This feature is non-breaking and adds new functionality.
A refactor was made to the memory queries, knowledge metadata, and browser support, enhancing system flexibility and enabling cross-platform support.

The cryptocurrency market is experiencing significant activity with notable changes in the prices and market caps of various digital assets. Bitcoin, the leading cryptocurrency, is currently priced at $98,172 with a 24-hour trading volume of $27,731,772,146 and a market cap of $1,946,721,729,820. It has seen a substantial daily change of 1402%.
Ethereum, another major player in the crypto space, is priced at $2,729.83. It has a 24-hour trading volume of $14,428,180,598 and a market cap of $329,246,849,382, with a daily change of 10.87%.
Solana is currently valued at $173.8, with a 24-hour trading volume of $3,739,486,772 and a market cap of $84,965,152,225. It has experienced a daily change of 4.69%.
The AI16Z token is priced at $0.3426, with a 24-hour trading volume of $13,133,010.65 and a market cap of $376,916,652. It has seen a daily change of 11.65%.

categories.title: Issues with ElizaOS Plugin Import and Agent Responses

content.text: There is a bug in the ElizaOS plugin import process from the plugin registry. The issue arises because the plugin names have changed from '@elizaos/plugin-<>' to '@elizaos-plugins/plugin-<>'. This change has caused the import process to fail, as demonstrated by the steps to reproduce the error. The expected behavior is for the plugin import to work seamlessly with the new plugin names.
The README file in the 'client-direct' package of ElizaOS is unclear. It appears to be more related to a fine-tuning plugin rather than the direct client, leading to confusion.

An issue has been reported where one of the agents frequently responds with a generic message about visual representation, even for text-based tweets. This problem is specific to the agent associated with the account 'TheBitcoinSon', while another agent, 'gabbarsingh_ai', responds correctly. Both agents are using the same GROQ paid account and API keys.

categories.title: AI Community Initiatives: CLANK TANK and ElizaOS Builder’s Chat

content.text: Introducing... CLANK TANK, a weekly game show created by the @ai16zdao community. Participants pitch ideas that are transformed into AI simulations to impress the audience.

Introducing: ElizaOS Builder’s Chat, an invite-only Telegram group for developers, founders, and AI enthusiasts. This community offers live collaboration, updates on framework enhancements, and peer feedback to support building with ElizaOS.

categories.title: Community and Development Updates from AI and Blockchain Projects

content.text: Introducing CLANK TANK, a weekly game show created by the @ai16zdao community. Participants pitch ideas that are transformed into AI simulations to impress the audience.
Development efforts have been focused on package improvements, new features, and bug fixes, with contributions from 10 developers resulting in 8 merged pull requests.

ElizaOS introduces the Builder’s Chat, an invite-only Telegram group for developers, founders, and AI enthusiasts. This community offers collaboration, updates, and feedback to support building with ElizaOS.
Esk3nder announces joining ElizaOS as Chief Product Officer after 2.5 years with @ensdomains.
